reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: WFD Human Rights Project in the Maghreb Region

description.narrative: The purpose of this project called ?WFD Human Rights Project in the Maghreb Region? has goals to strengthen the national associations of the deaf through a training program on organisational leadership and to increase awareness of the society on deaf issue s and human rights in the North Africa. Through these goals it is aimed to mainstream the deaf people's human rights in all aspects including the local level disability planning and policies. The two year projects is in Algeria Libya Mauritania Morocco and Tunisia. The Project activities are conducted in Tunisia and Morocco and the budget is 276.82200 euros. In the OECD/DAC classification Mauritania is a LDC Morocco is a lower middle income country and Algeria Tunisia and Libya are upper middle income clas s countries. The project consists of the following main activities: a) Two training programs delivered to 20 deaf leaders (hereafter the ?deaf participants?) consisting of a fair mix of female male and youth participants per year b) Seminars to the wider d eaf communities in the two countries the Project is conducted with invitations to other stakeholders c) Meetings with local agencies and other DPOs.
